review: I looked a few YouTube videos before buying these now I don't have to buy a smart TV saved $100 on that, got two of them on sale for $22ea. set up was easy, I would recommend this product.
author: reinaldo Topp

review: Does not allow screencasting from NFL rewind
author: stephen pronk

review: This device streamed the movie gift from Google Play ("Gravity") perfectly, my first real test of it. It also performed well in streaming offerings from Hulu and You Tube. Casting from my Chrome tabs was not as successful, however, but I suspect that was because the tablet (2012 version of Nexus 7) lacks the processing power to keep up with such streaming. I am now seriously considering switching my Netflix account from receiving DVDs to the streaming version. All told, this inexpensive player is worth owning.
author: John Gregory

review: Performance is as advertised. Very pleased.
author: Terry Patterson

review: Simply amazing, I love it. It was very easy to set up, and it exceeded my  expectations. I would recommend  it to my friends.
author: Terry Pearson

review: Broke before ever being able to use it
